thumb.description: 【人を恨むな、戦争を恨め】 かなり明るい祖母のお話。 脱脂粉乳はとてもじゃないが不味くて飲めんとも言ってました。 小学生の頃、平和学習で8月に2回学校に行ってました。 その時の宿題で、印象的だった話です。 まさか祖母も、こんな話を公にされているとは思うまい……… お盆だからな Don't hate people, hate war. This is a pretty cheerful story from my grandma. She said skim milk was so gross she couldn't drink it. When I was in elementary school, we went to school twice in August for peace education. This is a story that stuck with me from the homework we did back then. I bet my grandma never thought her story would be shared with everyone on YouTube...
